title: Another player heats up generative AI race as China introduces interim laws

title: Could movie studios use AI to replicate an actor's image and use it forever?
description: Look closely, because films in the future may include digital replicas of background actors.

title: FTC investigates ChatGPT-maker OpenAI for possible harm to users. Here's what you need to know
